alert.note: Alert for Bergen (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 23 at 9:09AM EST until December 23 at 9:02PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall and coastal storm surge. * WHERE...Portions of northeast New Jersey and southeast New York, including the following counties, in northeast New Jersey, Bergen. In southeast New York, Rockland. * WHEN...Until 1215 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Overflowing poor drainage areas. River or stream flows are elevated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 905 AM EST, Gauge reports indicated water levels near and above minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bergenfield, Tappan, Pearl River, Oradell, Norwood, Orangeburg, Dumont, New Milford, Tenafly, River Edge, Westwood, River Vale, Cresskill, Closter, Emerson, Old Tappan, Blauvelt, Demarest, Harrington Park and Northvale. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
